Docs.summary: Provides a design-time editor in a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](../../add/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)], for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> object.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EditValue (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EditValue(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.IServiceProvider provider, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> that can be used to gain additional context information.
An <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider"> that this editor can use to obtain services.
Docs.summary: Edits the specified object's value using the editor style indicated by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method.
Docs.returns: The new value of the object. If the value of the object has not changed, this should return the same object it was passed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle GetEditStyle(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext> that can be used to gain additional context information.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the edit style that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TreeNodeCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> method.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> value that indicates the style of editor used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.TreeNodeCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> method. If the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> does not support this method, then <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> will return <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>.
